revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Weather Institute |image = [[File:Weather Institute.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Weather Institute. |tokens = 26,000 |location = Route 119 }} '''Weather Institute''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 470,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Castform.png|40px]] '''Castform''' || <center> '''1,820,000''' || [[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena || <center> 910,000 |- |}
<!--T:6--> *Must have cleared Weather Institute at least once to unlock Castform
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Damp Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Smooth Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Heat Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Icy Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Mystic Water}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Damp Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Smooth Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Heat Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Icy Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Mystic Water}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |} </tab> </tabs>
